animeDescription: Search your favourite anime by title with this command.

animeExtended.extendedHelp: This command queries Kitsu.io to show data for the anime you request.

mangaDescription: Search your favourite manga by title with this command.

mangaExtended.extendedHelp: This command queries Kitsu.io to show data for the manga you request.

waifuDescription: Posts a randomly generated waifu image.

waifuExtended.extendedHelp: This commands posts a random waifu generated by <https://thiswaifudoesnotexist.net/>

animeInvalidChoice: That's an invalid choice! Please try with another option.
animeNoSynopsis: No synopsis available for this title.
